doc.knownrelatives: John Jones, Andrew Benedict, Bernon Reeves (husbands, deceased), Seventh (real name unrevealed, daughter by Vernon Reeves), three unidentified daughters by John Jones; Hans Knoblach (father, deceased), Gertrude Hunter (mother, deceased), Gloria Knoblach (sister, deceased), William Knoblach (Clarity, brother), unidentified aunts (deceased), 20 unidentified grandchildren, more than 60 unidentified great-grandchildren, Bonita (aka Bonnie, last name unrevealed, descendant, deceased), 30,000 other alleged descendants including Gina Anderson, Jean Grey and Sara Grey-Bailey
doc.occupation: High Priestess of the Dark Sister Hood
doc.powers: The Dark Mother possessed the ability to open warp holes or portal through dimensions. She also possessed precognitive mutant psychic powers of the mind.
